alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 17 at 5:29PM CST until February 17 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Blount, Fayette, Jefferson, Lamar, Pickens, Tuscaloosa and Walker. * WHEN...Until 1130 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 529 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Northern Birmingham, Jasper, Gardendale, Fultondale, Fayette, Sumiton, Cordova, Dora, Carbon Hill, Vernon, Millport, Dallas, Center Point, Pinson, Tarrant, Adamsville, Warrior, Kimberly, Graysville and Morris.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
